key.name: close-key
key.description: Close windows while in scale mode

key.name: close-button
key.description: Close window while in scale mode

key.name: pull-key
key.description: Pull window to current viewport while in scale mode

key.name: pull-button
key.description: Pull window to current viewport while in scale mode

key.name: zoom-key
key.description: Zoom window while in scale mode

key.name: zoom-button
key.description: Zoom window while in scale mode

key.name: window-title
key.description: Window title display in scale mode (0 = No display, 1 = Highlighted window only, 2 = All windows)

key.name: title-bold
key.description: Use bold font for window title display

key.name: title-size
key.description: Font size for window title display (6 - 48)

key.name: border-size
key.description: Size of the border around the window title (1 - 20)

key.name: font-color
key.description: Font color of the window title

key.name: back-color
key.description: Background color of the window title

key.name: window-highlight
key.description: Highlights the hovered window with the given color

key.name: highlight-color
key.description: Color used for highlighting the hovered window

key.name: layout-mode
key.description: Selects the mode to layout the windows in scale mode (0 = Normal, 1 = Natural)

key.name: natural-precision
key.description: How precisely windows should be pushed apart. Increasing this makes windows that are further apart closer together, but also increases CPU usage (1.0 - 20.0)

key.name: constrain-pull-to-screen
key.description: Make sure windows are fully visible after pulling them to another viewport

key.name: exit-after-pull
key.description: Exit scale mode after a window has been pulled.
